post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer some deals on OpenVZ and Dedicated servers. We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services. All servers are located in Chicago, IL. Dedicated servers have very limited stock, so don’t wait too long!  
  
  
**Dual Xeon X5660 Dedicated Server**  
* 6 Core / 12 Threads @ 2.8GHz / 3.2GHz Turbo  
* 16GB DDR3 RAM  
* 2x 2TB HDD  
* /29 IPv4 + IPv6 Available  
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
$29/m - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=86)  
  
  
**SSD OpenVZ VPS**  
* 8GB RAM  
* 100GB RAID10 SSD  
* 2x vCPU  
* 1 IPv4 + IPv6 Available  
* 10TB Bandwidth  
* $20.20/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=87)  
  
  
**HDD OpenVZ VPS**  
* 12GB RAM  
* 500GB RAID10 HDD  
* 4x vCPU  
* 1 IPv4 + IPv6 Available  
* 15TB Bandwidth  
* $5/m - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=77) / $4.17/m paid annually - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=77&billingcycle=annually)    
  
  
Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment. Dedicated servers will be setup within 1-3 business days.  
  
Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/  
  
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
  
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or [open a sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
